_README: RAWSOURCE BUILD RULES — Compact single-file reference for all page generation. This file replaces the 30KB transfer doc for active building sessions. The master JSON (v8.2, 1095 chemicals) remains the DATA source; this file is the RULES source.

company.name: RawSource
company.type: Specialty chemical distributor — bulk only (pallets, totes, isotanks, tankers)
company.tone: Industrial vendor portal — serious, technical, structured

logo.description: Hexagonal RS icon in gold/amber gradient — transparent PNG, RGBA, 320x58px
logo.format: PNG with alpha channel (color type 6 = RGBA). Confirmed transparent.
logo.embed_method: ALWAYS base64 data URI inside an tag. Never use
logo.source_file: logo_base64.txt in GitHub repo (30582 chars including data:image/png;base64, prefix)
logo.source_of_truth: The EXACT base64 string from calcium-carbonate-FINAL.html line 101 (header) and line 248 (footer)

HEADER_RULES.background: Logo sits on #0C1E3D navy dark header — transparency makes gold icon float on dark bg

NEVER_DO: NEVER generate or recreate the logo — always use the exact base64 string
NEVER use a white/black background behind the logo — it is transparent PNG and must stay that way
NEVER convert to SVG, JPEG, or any other format
NEVER use CSS background-image to place the logo — always tag
NEVER change the aspect ratio — only set height, let width auto-scale
NEVER put the logo on a light background without testing visibility first
NEVER set width explicitly — only height (24px header, 20px footer)
NEVER add border, box-shadow, or any visual effects to the logo img
ALWAYS_DO: ALWAYS copy the full base64 string exactly — do not truncate or modify
ALWAYS set display:block on header logo to prevent inline gaps
ALWAYS place logo inside an <a> link to homepage in header
ALWAYS use the same base64 string for both header and footer — they are identical

TESTED_BACKGROUNDS.#0C1E3D_navy_dark: ✅ PRIMARY — header and footer. Gold icon pops on dark navy.
TESTED_BACKGROUNDS.#E9A72D_gold: ❌ DOES NOT WORK — gold logo on gold background is invisible. NEVER place logo on gold background. If a section uses gold bg, use a dark container for the logo or omit it.

voice.style: Confident, technical, zero fluff. Every sentence carries information.
voice.audience: Enterprise industrial buyers who know MDEA, HEDP, xanthate
voice.chemical_formatting: H₂S not H2S; CAS numbers in mono font

taxonomy._RULE: LOCKED. No new values without explicit JP approval. No variations, synonyms, or free text.

data_rules.zero_hallucination: NEVER invent CAS numbers, descriptions, functional roles, classifications, or any chemical data
data_rules.empty_fields: If data doesn't exist, the field stays EMPTY — never fill with assumptions
data_rules.classification_source: Deterministic mappings from PubChem + CosIng — NOT AI guesses

conditional_rendering.hero_stats: Only show boxes where data exists
conditional_rendering.ghs_card: Only render if signal_word OR pictograms exist
conditional_rendering.un_box: Only render if pubchem_un_number is non-empty
conditional_rendering.physical_props: Only render properties that have values
conditional_rendering.abbreviation: Only show if abbreviations[] is non-empty

site_architecture.tech_stack: Static HTML, inlined CSS, vanilla JS. NO React/Vue/Angular.

catalog.status: IN PROGRESS — needs v5 template rebuild with correct branding

mining.status: NOT STARTED — currently combined with Oil & Gas

industry_page_pattern.door_a: What problem are you solving? → Application segments → Process problems → Chemical solutions
industry_page_pattern.door_b: Browse by product family → Family cards with chemical count → Detail pages filtered by industry + subsystem
industry_page_pattern.door_c: Procurement support → 6 service cards (TDS/SDS, Spec Matching, Bulk Packaging, Regulatory, Multi-Site, Emergency) → Intake forms → RFQ pipeline

seo_preservation._CRITICAL: ZERO SEO PROGRESS MAY BE LOST. Every new page must lay perfectly on top of the existing rawsource.com WordPress/WooCommerce infrastructure. No URL changes. No broken links. No orphaned pages.

wordpress_infrastructure.deployment: New HTML pages replace existing WordPress pages at the SAME URLs. Old pages stay live until new ones are verified.

live_url_map_LOCKED._note: These are the ACTUAL URLs live on rawsource.com RIGHT NOW. Our new pages MUST use these EXACT paths.

product_pages.rule: 885 chemicals have existing WooCommerce source_url — those slugs are LOCKED FOREVER. NEVER change an existing slug.

existing_industry_sub_pages_KEEP_OR_REDI._rule: These pages are LIVE and INDEXED. They must either stay live or get 301 redirected to the new equivalent Door A/B page.

seo_rules_non_negotiable: NEVER change an existing URL slug — new page goes at the SAME URL the old page lives at
EVERY page: canonical tag, Schema.org structured data, unique <title>, unique <meta description>
EVERY product page preserves its WooCommerce slug exactly
Existing sub-pages must stay live OR get 301 redirects — NEVER just delete
Internal links use absolute URLs: https://rawsource.com{path}
WooCommerce pages stay live as fallback until Google Search Console confirms indexing
sitemap.xml regenerated after every deployment batch
Monitor rankings for 30 days before removing any fallback page

product_page_field_map.hero_stats: GHS signal word, UN number, density, melting point (CONDITIONAL — only if data exists)
product_page_field_map.industries: industry (split on ';') OR industries[] → green wash tags
product_page_field_map.ghs_safety: pubchem_ghs (CONDITIONAL — hide entire card if no data)
product_page_field_map.chem_identity: cas_number, pubchem_molecular_formula, pubchem_molecular_weight, pubchem_iupac_name, pubchem_inchi_key, pubchem_cid
product_page_field_map.synonyms: Filter to human-readable names only (EXCLUDE: SCHEMBL, UNII, InChI keys, numeric codes)
product_page_field_map.related: Same material_family + same top industry, limit 4

json_schema_key_fields._note: These are the CRITICAL fields from the master JSON that drive page generation

previous_mistakes_NEVER_repeat: ChatGPT batch classification: 76.9% unclassified, 100% enum violations
DM Sans font: WRONG — ALL industry templates still have this. Must be Plus Jakarta Sans
Gold #E8A838: WRONG — ALL industry templates still have this. Must be #E9A72D
RS square placeholder logo: WRONG — ALL industry templates still have this. Must use base64 PNG
Â° encoding artifacts: UTF-8 mojibake in WooCommerce descriptions. Must sanitize on render
Availability badges (Verified/Likely/Sourcing): REJECTED — these were taxonomy confidence, not inventory
Logo with black background: REJECTED — must use transparent PNG
Table-based catalog: REJECTED — must use card grid with sidebar filters

page_hierarchy._overview: Every industry follows the SAME 4-level page hierarchy. The STRUCTURE is identical across all 13 industries — only the DATA changes.

level_1_industry_landing.purpose: Main entry point for an industry. Tabs give 3 doors into the content.

structure.header: Global site header with base64 logo (24px), nav links, search

hero.layout: 2-column grid: text left (h1, tagline, stat chips, CTAs) + photo right
hero.tagline: 1-2 sentences, what RawSource supplies for this industry
hero.stat_chips: 3 chips: X Unique Chemistries, Y Product Families, Z Application Segments
hero.ctas: Primary: Request Bulk Quote (gold). Secondary: Browse Product Families (ghost)
hero.photo: Industry-specific image with label overlay. PLACEHOLDER OK for now — photos come later

panel_overview.content: Industry description, supply category pills that link to Door B segments

panel_door_a.label: What problem are you solving?
panel_door_a.segment_toggle: Pill buttons that filter by application segment (e.g., Row Crops, Specialty Crops, Livestock)
panel_door_a.content: Tile grid of process problems. Each tile = title + 1-line desc + 'View solutions →'

panel_door_b.label: Product Families
panel_door_b.content: Family cards with: badge (Available/Sourcing), family name, description, role chips, chemistry count + preview (top 3 with CAS in mono), 'View family →'

panel_door_c.label: Procurement Support
panel_door_c.content: 3-column grid of 6 service cards: TDS/SDS Library, Spec Matching, Bulk Packaging, Regulatory, Multi-Site Delivery, Emergency Sourcing

structure.rfq_sidebar: Fixed right panel (collapsible). Fields: Chemical, CAS, Volume, Packaging, Application segment, Name, Email, Company. Advanced: Destination, Incoterms
structure.footer_cta: Full-width navy dark bar: 'Discuss Your {Industry} Requirements' + Submit RFQ button + Contact link

level_2_solution_detail.purpose: Deep-dive on a specific process problem. Shows WHY it matters, HOW to solve it, and WHICH chemicals to use.

sidebar.content: Full list of ALL problems for this industry, grouped by segment. Active item highlighted with left navy border
sidebar.behavior: Click any sidebar item to switch to that problem WITHOUT page reload (SPA-style)

hero.eyebrow: {Segment Name} — Process Problem (mono, uppercase, gold color)

sections.title: Why It Matters
sections.content: Business impact statement — what happens if you don't solve this

sections.title: Solution Approach
sections.content: Technical explanation of the chemistry approach

sections.title: Recommended Chemistries
sections.content: Chemical cards with: name, CAS (mono), role badge, description (2-line clamp), physical properties, 'Details →'. Click opens DRAWER.

sections.title: Related Product Families
sections.content: Links to Level 3 family pages relevant to this problem

chemical_drawer.content: Full chemical detail: name, CAS, IUPAC, description, functional roles (tags), industries (tags), physical properties grid, GHS info. Buttons: Request Quote + link to full Product Page (Level 4)

structure.bottom_cta: Need help selecting? → RFQ button + Talk to Chemist

level_3_family_detail.purpose: All chemicals in a product family, filtered to this industry. The screenshot user uploaded shows this page.

structure.layout: Sidebar + Main content with product cards

sidebar.title: PRODUCT FAMILIES (uppercase, muted)
sidebar.segments: Grouped by application segment (e.g., ROW CROPS & FIELD)
sidebar.items: Family name + chemistry count badge. Active item has left navy border
sidebar.behavior: Click switches the main content to that family

main_content.product_cards: Grid of chemical cards, each showing: product name (bold), CAS (mono), role badge (uppercase, colored), description (truncated), physical properties (Melting Point, Boiling Point, Density, Flash Point), family label + 'Details →'
main_content.card_links_to: Level 4 product page (/product/{slug}/) OR opens chemical drawer
